==Locations==
Cicins' locations cannot be pinpointed by using the [[Adventurer Handbook]], as there is no entry about them.
*Electro Cicins can be found near [[Guyun Stone Forest]].
*[[Fatui Electro Cicin Mage]]s always summon three Electro Cicins.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Little creatures that can ever so slightly manipulate Electro.<br>They and other such creatures are known collectively as Cicins, and though they are individually weak, they can cause significant damage under the right circumstances.|[[Archive]]}}
